survey_brief: This survey aims to understand commuting habits and preferences related to sustainable transportation methods among urban residents.

questions.question_text: How often do you commute to work or school in a typical week?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you commute to work or school in a typical week?

questions.question_text: What is your primary mode of transportation for commuting?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 != 'I do not commute'
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary mode of transportation for commuting?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 != 'I do not commute'

questions.question_text: How important is environmental sustainability in your choice of transportation?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How important is environmental sustainability in your choice of transportation?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable transportation options would you consider using? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include a 'None of the above' option.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable transportation options would you consider using? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using sustainable transportation more often?
answer_options: Lack of infrastructure (e.g., bike lanes, charging stations)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q4 != 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using sustainable transportation more often?
answer_options: Lack of infrastructure (e.g., bike lanes, charging stations)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q4 != 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of sustainable transportation options in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of sustainable transportation options in your area?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay more for a transportation option if it were more environmentally friendly?
questions.client_notes: Include a neutral option ('It depends') for those unsure.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay more for a transportation option if it were more environmentally friendly?

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use sustainable transportation more often? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Better infrastructure (e.g., bike lanes, charging stations)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q4 != 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use sustainable transportation more often? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Better infrastructure (e.g., bike lanes, charging stations)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q4 != 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: How likely are you to switch to a more sustainable transportation method in the next year?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to switch to a more sustainable transportation method in the next year?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions about sustainable transportation in your area?
questions.client_notes: Leave this as an open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions about sustainable transportation in your area?
